trans-unit.source: Represents a single [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43) element in an MSBuild project.
trans-unit.target: Representa um elemento [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43) em um projeto do MSBuild.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <c>AssemblyFile</c> attribute value of the [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43) element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de atributo <c>AssemblyFile</c> do elemento [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43).

trans-unit.source: The <c>AssemblyFile</c> attribute value of the <c>UsingTask</c> element.
trans-unit.target: O <c>AssemblyFile</c> valor de atributo de <c>UsingTask</c> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <c>AssemblyName</c> attribute value of the [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43) element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de atributo <c>AssemblyName</c> do elemento [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43).

trans-unit.source: The <c>AssemblyName</c> attribute value of the <c>UsingTask</c> element.
trans-unit.target: O <c>AssemblyName</c> valor de atributo de <c>UsingTask</c> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <c>Condition</c> attribute value of the [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43) element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de atributo <c>Condition</c> do elemento [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43).

trans-unit.source: The <c>Condition</c> attribute value of the <c>UsingTask</c> element.
trans-unit.target: O <c>condição</c> valor de atributo de <c>UsingTask</c> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43) element was imported into the project.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43) foi importado para o projeto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <c>UsingTask</c> element was imported into the project; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <c>UsingTask</c> elemento foi importado para o projeto; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <c>TaskName</c> attribute value of the [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43) element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de atributo <c>TaskName</c> do elemento [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43).

trans-unit.source: The <c>TaskName</c> attribute value of the <c>UsingTask</c> element.
trans-unit.target: O <c>TaskName</c> valor de atributo de <c>UsingTask</c> elemento.
